website_summaries.verdict: Strong hook-and-loop strips make these pajamas easy to put on, even on the fussiest of dogs.
pros: Soft material keeps your dog warm and cozy while remaining breathable
Easily opens and closes with strong hook-and-loop patches
Available in pink, blue, and red
cons: Arms and legs run quite long and may need to be rolled up

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly durable
customer_reviews.text: Got this for the smaller Chihuahua, however legs proved say too long. Tried it on he mini pin and it was better. I thought however the Velcro closings would never hold. So far they have despite runnig, rolling and burrowing under covers.
customer_reviews.author: E. Durham

customer_reviews.title: Weird fit
customer_reviews.text: The top line of the pjs is so long it extends beyond the dogs tail and the elastic holds it under the rump.
customer_reviews.author: lovesamazon

customer_reviews.title: Too cute!!
customer_reviews.text: These are ADORABLE!! The price was very reasonable as well, and the quality is great! They velcro at his back, so they're very easy to put on, just slip over front feet, velcro, over back feet, and prepare to be overwhelmed with cuteness!!
customer_reviews.author: KB28052

customer_reviews.title: Size
customer_reviews.text: Too large. Small should have been listed as a M/L. My fur babies are 4 & 6lbs
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Cuteness
customer_reviews.text: Love it, except my dog had the buttons chewed off in less than one day.
customer_reviews.author: Tamzer

customer_reviews.title: These are cute!
customer_reviews.text: This was alittle big for my pomapoo. I took them up alittle and now they fit better. I should have ordered the extra small, I will do that next time. Otherwise, they look really cute on her. They wash well with no shrinkage or fading. Fast delivery & good price.
customer_reviews.author: sweetie8

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: I followed the measure guide for the fit. My 9 lb Maltese was in the small size. Order and it was way too big, at least twice his size. Then I ordered down for the xsmall. It was the right size but the quality was awful. Threads coming undone and edges frayed. Returned and will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: cookie

customer_reviews.title: this works great for him on our cold nights
customer_reviews.text: I have a Chinese crested and live in Pennsylvania, this works great for him on our cold nights.
customer_reviews.author: Amburr

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: Love this pj for my puppy! Can't wait to see what this provider has available in the future! I will definitely use them again!
customer_reviews.author: MRP219

customer_reviews.title: Love the style of these pj's
customer_reviews.text: Love the style of these pj's. The only drawback is that pieces of the velcro are falling off and getting stuck in my dogs fur.
customer_reviews.author: Msmontyd

customer_reviews.title: Brand runs big.
customer_reviews.text: Too large so it's being returned for a smaller size. This brand runs big.
customer_reviews.author: Ronda

product_meta.title: Cozy Thermal Dog Pajamas
product_meta.description: Size:Small| Color:BluePetRageous Designs, Cozy Thermal PJ's Blue w/White Stitching, in small are comfortable pajamas for your dog. They feature a waffle weave thermal knit with faux back flap, decorative buttons and contrast topstitching. The back closer holds them securely on your dog while the pattern will keep them looking cozy.
feature_bullets: Features a waffle weave thermal knit with faux back flap, decorative buttons and contrast topstitching
The back closer holds them securely on your dog
This pattern will keep your dog looking cozy
The blue color is perfect for any dog

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
